233 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& stream, const AudioOutput::MutedState& state) {
234  switch (state) {
235  case AudioOutput::MutedState::MUTED:
236  stream << "MUTED";
237  break;
238  case AudioOutput::MutedState::UNMUTED:
239  stream << "UNMUTED";
240  break;
241  }
242  return stream;
243 }
